timeline.body:
Probably more understandable written as:
```suggestion
        .map(parentEpoch -> getEpoch(blockRoot).dividedBy(n).isGreaterThan(parentEpoch.dividedBy(n)))
```

Otherwise `parentEpoch` is a misleading name and it's hard to see the symmetry of dividing both epochs.
